WSUS31 KKCI 170155 
SIGE  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 4E 
VALID UNTIL 0355Z 
FL AND FL GA CSTL WTRS 
FROM 130ENE CRG-80E OMN-40NNE RSW-50SSW ORL-60ENE CRG-130ENE CRG 
AREA EMBD TS MOV FROM 24025KT. TOPS TO FL300. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 170355-170755 
AREA 1...FROM 70ENE CHS-130SE ILM-70ESE MIA-60ENE EYW-40ESE 
SRQ-50NW ORL-50SSW SAV-70ENE CHS 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM 70SSW CEW-60SSW TLH-40WSW CTY-80W PIE-160S 
CEW-70SSW CEW 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.

WSUS04 KKCI 162336 
DFWO WS 162336 
SIGMET OSCAR 3 VALID UNTIL 170336 
SIGMET  
TX LA AND CSTL WTRS 
FROM FST TO 30S AEX TO 70SE LCH TO 80SSE MRF TO FST 
OCNL SEV TURB BTN FL290 AND FL380. DUE TO WNDSHR ASSOCD WITH 
JTST. CONDS CONTG BYD 0336Z.
